App Name: Prank Screen, Broken Wallpaper Package Name: com.prankphone.broken.screen.diamond.bg

Brief:

Prank Screen, Broken Wallpaper is the ultimate trickster's toolbox designed to turn any smartphone into a hilarious prank instrument. From high-stakes timer bomb shenanigans to frighteningly realistic crack screen effects, this app ensures a good laugh, or maybe a heart-stopping moment, for your unsuspecting victims. Adorn your device with dazzling diamond backgrounds and entertain (or terrorize) friends and family with an array of giggles and gasps.
